Description.Text: A small, friendly & family run Bungalow complex set in tropical gardens and based around a large swimming pool (heated in the winter). Each Bunglow has seperate outside sun terrace, one bedroom with comfrtable lounge and fitted kitchen. There are two privately owned restaurants on site and seperate pool-side snack ber. Tennis court and mini-market on site.

Tennis, swimming or complete relaxation around the pool. ** As the name suggests, this complex is within walking distance of the best Golf course on the island. The staff will be only too pleased to assist with any information you require, contact details, prices etc for all the other courses. They can organise your reservations and can arrange your transport.

This Bungalow complex in Maspalomas is well known to holiday makers and golfers alike. A high standard of comfortable accommodation set in beautiful & peaceful surroundings. Just 50m from the Golf Course of Maspalomas and a very pleasant 900m walk to the famous sand dunes. With two restaurants on site and a pool bar / cafeteria this has always been a very pooppular choice with couples of all ages & families. A very peaceful destination with the life of the resort only a short distance away.
Located in Maspalomas. Just 500m from the nearest commercial centre (Faro) and 900m from the sand dunes. 50 metres to the Golf Course
